name: BMDC
body:
#### BMDC++ ####
[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/bmdcpp/bmdc.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/bmdcpp/bmdc)

Project BMDC++ is based on FreeDC++ client and some more up-to-date dcpp core.

Code of it is on [[https://launchpad.net/bmdc++|Launchpad.net]].

Its Run on any modern Linux Distro.

#### Attention ####
BMDC++ has been designed to share a non-copyrighted material only! Program developer isn't responsible for activities which the users use this software to.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
